channel.title: Help PLEASE!Changing client background at login screen
channel.description:
Hello, im having some trouble changing the background picture on the login screen but im also new at this so please dont judge me but,if you can help or lead me to a link or tell me how ill be thankfull
thanks :)

item.title: Help PLEASE!Changing client background at login screen
item.dc:creator: @Nuggetdabest Nuggetdabest
item.description:
@Nuggetdabest wrote:

Goodbye RS:

Go into your sprites folder and find the backround image then edit it with paint, photoshop, or any other program.

Thats basicly it.

Read full topic
